amount.description: A positive integer in the smallest currency unit (that is, 100 cents for $1.00, or 1 for Â¥1, Japanese Yen being a zero-decimal currency) representing the total amount for the order.

currency.description: Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html), in lowercase. Must be a [supported currency](https://stripe.com/docs/currencies).

email.description: The email address of the customer placing the order.

amount.description: The amount (price) for this order item.

currency.description: This currency of this order item. Required when `amount` is present.

description.description: Human-readable description for this order item.

parent.description: The ID of the associated object for this line item. Expandable if not null (e.g., expandable to a SKU).

quantity.description: The quantity of this order item. When type is `sku`, this is the number of instances of the SKU to be ordered.

type.description: The type of this order item. Must be `sku`, `tax`, or `shipping`.
